name: Temple a first story
description:
The Temple is a addictive brain and puzzle game, where your task is to destroy all the fields on the screen. To complete this task you have to rack your brain and deal with 80 levels. They all levels have interesting graphics and very good music. The Temple is a game with levels of rising difficulty, which tries to provide all players a lot of satisfaction (when the puzzle is solved).

Features:
- 80 levels
- high quality graphics
- very good gameplay
- particle effects
- user friendly interface

This is a great logic game (brain and puzzle type).
